programme.title: Operation Healing Heroes
programme.desc: Bill Hayes was at ground zero on September 11th, 2001. Now twenty years later, Bill recalls his time serving overseas in the military as well as a New York City Firefighter.

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: Trenton stays close to home and heads to the Lake of The Ozarks joining Austin Culbertson for a frigid couple days of fishing. The cold weather doesn’t hold back the fish, though, as they target brush piles with jerk baits and umbrella rigs.

programme.title: Saltwater Underground
programme.desc: Bassmaster legend Mike Iaconelli joins Nick in a wild time chasing down striped bass blitzes off the Jersey Coast, getting bent rods from the boat and surf.

programme.title: Sportsman's Journal
programme.desc: Tyler and Sara spend the last night of the year on the ice chasing crappies after dark!

programme.title: The Raven Project
programme.desc: Randy, Dustin and Cody are finishing up food plots when they run into a huge problem with army worms but first they are doing some wheeling and dealing on a new rut hut for The Raven.

programme.title: The Raven Project - "The Buck Plot"
programme.desc: With the Buck Plot starting to turn on Randy has an encounter with a big ten they haven't seen before.

programme.title: Baitfuel Fishing Tournament
programme.sub-title: BaitFuel Fishing Tour - "Thousand Islands Open Day 1"
programme.desc: Day 1 of the Thousand Islands Open on Lake Ontario and the St,. Lawrence River.

programme.title: Fly Shop Tour
programme.desc: This episode we make our way through South Carolina, where we stop in Clemson, Travelers Rest and Charleston!!

programme.title: The Cast
programme.desc: Trenton and Trevor pack up and drive down to Arkansas for their first experience on the White River. The brothers spend a day in the boat with Bryant Stark of Rising Rivers, fishing the White and the Norfork. Though the White is much larger waters than back home, Trevor utilizes his experience to catch them even while wading.

programme.title: Deer and Deer Hunting
programme.desc: There's no doubt that social media has provided the hunting community a platform for expansion and a place within today's technological society, but can hunters go too far with their posts and potentially harm the community we all love?

programme.title: Deer and Deer Hunting
programme.desc: In this episode of Deer & Deer Hunting TV we stray from the whitetail path to find out just how elusive the exotic Axis deer can be

programme.title: Deer and Deer Hunting
programme.desc: We all wait around each year for bow or traditional gun season to come around, and there's nothing wrong with that. But let's not overlook one of the best hunts that's often left on the table each year, muzzleloader season.

programme.title: Deer and Deer Hunting
programme.desc: A profile of the whitetails that live in the sandhills of Nebraska and how to hunt them.

programme.title: The Raven Project
programme.desc: It has been a hell of a week in Mexico but the guys aren't done yet. They still have some time to lay some critters down!

programme.title: The Raven Project
programme.desc: While Randy and Dustin are trying to get the farm ready for Fall plots and create new access trails, Cody is at the river living life to the fullest. Randy finally has had enough and is doing something about Cody’s lack of effort on the farm.

programme.title: The Raven Project
programme.desc: The guys are going on all in on Fall Food Plots. With Season right around the Corner they are trying to get everything done before they run out of time.

programme.title: The Raven Project
programme.desc: After a long hard summer and putting in a ton of sweat equity, the guys are finally able to climb in a tree and see if they can notch a tag. With Nate Hosie as a guest in camp there is sure to be some good tunes and lots of laughs during the first bow camp at The Raven.

programme.title: The Raven Project - "Big Tine Mineral"
programme.desc: Why are minerals so important for your heard? Randy takes you through the details of why he uses Big Tine mineral on The Raven.

programme.title: The Hunted Land & Sea
programme.desc: The Hunted Land & Sea series premiere. Meet the cast, see the home ranch and learn the story behind the series origin while getting a small taste of what is to come with a Nilgai hunt in Texas.

programme.title: The Hunted Land & Sea
programme.desc: With Kristian at sea, his father Kim watches close friend Gerry Holland archery hunt the home ranch for the hit list deer.

programme.title: The Hunted Land & Sea
programme.desc: Grant Ellsworth hunts the Hansen Ranch during rifle season hoping to get remaining hit list bucks “The Big Guy” in the freezer or the “Management buck” down before the rut.

programme.title: The Hunted Land & Sea
programme.desc: Kristian's father Kim Hansen and close friend Gerry Holland travel to Kona for some deep-sea fishing aboard the “Kona Blue” with long time friend Caption Marlin Kahl.

programme.title: Ship Shape TV
programme.desc: During this episode of Ship Shape TV Essentials the SSTV team is at - John’s lake house on Tupper Lake, NY. They are checking out some of the damage done to John’s pontoon decking from freezing weather they received. John and the team are upgrading the material, and adding carpeting to the pontoon decking. We also get some information on SPX-Johnson bilge pumps and the ease of access they provide.

programme.title: Ship Shape TV
programme.desc: During this episode of Ship Shape TV Essentials the SSTV team is at - John’s lake house on Tupper Lake, NY, where they are tackling a new paint Job using Interlux’s paint specifically designed for aluminum hulls. John and the crew take us step by step on what takes to paint on aluminum hulls as well as some other tips from guest hosts.

programme.title: Blair Wiggins Outdoor
programme.desc: Hunter Bach takes Blair to the northern part of the Indian River to catch redfish.

programme.title: Breaking Boundaries
programme.desc: With the fall transition just about to happen, JP finds the fishing very tough as the bass are still in transition.

programme.title: FinQuest Outdoors
programme.desc: In the premiere of FinQuest, freshwater pro Ryan Miller dives into the world of saltwater fishing in Florida. Guided by Alex Burgess, Ryan tackles sailfish and tuna while mastering kite fishing. The adventure continues with his family as they enjoy a thrilling hydrofoil ride in Jupiter, Florida, blending fishing excitement with family fun on the water.

programme.title: Blair Wiggins Outdoor
programme.desc: Throughout the season we get a lot of footage that never makes it on the show and isn't enough for a whole episode, so we put it together here in Bits & Bites.

programme.title: Beyond The Surface
programme.desc: On this episode, Capt. Danny joins a highly decorated pair of tournament anglers in their home water’s of Panama City! The level of competitiveness and comradery between the three of them up on the bow for the day, is certainly something to watch!

programme.title: Captain's Log
programme.desc: Capt. Jonathan Moss ventures to South Florida with the hope of having a few Exotic Encounters.

programme.title: Reel Animals
programme.desc: Mike fishes for striped bass next to the iconic city scape of New York.

programme.title: Louisiana Catch and Cook
programme.desc: Escape to the beautiful shores of Grand Isle, Louisiana where musician and community advocate David St. Romain joins Chef Jay Ducote for a weekend of fishing, crabbing, and oyster harvesting. Watch as Chef Mark Boudreaux of Hurricane Hole transforms their fresh catch into a culinary feast. Enjoy the thrill of fishing, the joy of cooking and the camaraderie of camp in The Bayou State.

programme.title: The Reel American Road Trip
programme.desc: There is a place in Florida that not many people have heard about. The Forgotten Coast, Ever heard of it? Didn’t think so. Let’s discover it together.

programme.title: The Reel American Road Trip
programme.desc: No, we aren’t talking about a hair dew. Danny hangs out with some amazing people that commercial fish for Florida gold.

programme.title: Sail Kings
programme.desc: Featuring Capt. Charlie Scoble & Donnie Lang on a mother ship trip aboard the “TACKLE CENTER” to the Dry Tortugas

programme.title: Sail Kings
programme.desc: Featuring Capt. Charlie Scoble & Donnie Lang on a mother ship trip aboard the “TACKLE CENTER” to the Dry Tortugas Part 2.

programme.title: Saltwater Experience
programme.desc: Captains Tom Rowland and Rich Tudor meet up with Captain Nick LaBadie at Big Pine Key for an action packed day on the flats chasing tarpon, bonefish and permit for the elusive grand slam.

programme.title: Saltwater Experience
programme.desc: Captains Tom Rowland and Rich Tudor run from Hawks Cay Resort up to Islamorada on a windy day to fish under the mangroves for Goliath grouper.

programme.title: Saltwater Experience
programme.desc: Captains Tom Rowland and Rich Tudor join Captain Bryson Shaaber to fish the channels around Key West targeting big spring tarpon with live pinfish.

programme.title: Saltwater Experience
programme.desc: Captains Tom Rowland and Rich Tudor launch out of Key Largo and fish their way up a creek filled with monsters.

programme.title: Life On The Water
programme.sub-title: "Ft Myers Beach: Inshore with Ozzie Fischer"
programme.desc: It's a trip back to Southwest Florida to chase after Redfish and Snook. Plus, a special tour of the Costa Custom Boat Factory

programme.title: Life On The Water
programme.desc: Snapper and Grouper out in the Gulf of Mexico are waiting for Brandon Simmons and Eric Davis. They just have to ride the sporty chop to get to them.

programme.title: We Caught That
programme.desc: Capt. Jason Dozier joins Capt. Brian Sawyer on an exhilarating pursuit of Silver Kings prowling the waters of Homosassa.

programme.title: We Caught That
programme.desc: Capt. Jason Dozier teams up with Capt. David Paycheck for a day of firsts. Jason tries a new style of bass fishing with David, and then introduces David to hunting Moorhen for the first time.

programme.title: We Caught That
programme.desc: In this episode, Jason Dozier teams up with his longtime friend, Capt. Danny, for an exciting fishing adventure in Tampa Bay. Reuniting on the water for the first time in over a decade, they're looking forward to making memories, enjoying the day, and maybe even reeling in a fresh catch for dinner.

programme.title: We Caught That
programme.desc: In this episode, Capt. Jason Dozier teams up with Capt. Griffin Deans to chase the elusive Hogfish. With the Hogfish proving elusive, they manage to turn the day into a success, filling the box with an impressive haul and reeling in a few massive catches along the way.

programme.title: We Caught That
programme.desc: Capt. Jason Dozier and Janot take a break from the guided trips, and take themselves on a hunting adventure.

programme.title: We Caught That
programme.desc: Capt. Jason Dozier takes a trip out of Sebastian Inlet with Capt. Glyn Austin looking to catch Sharks, Tarpon, and anything else that bites.

programme.title: Winchester Life
programme.desc: Shotgun sports are experiencing unprecedented growth, with competitions across the country gaining popularity as enthusiasts vie to be the best shooters in the world. Every summer, the Amateur Trapshooting Association hosts The Grand American in Sparta, Illinois. This year marks the 125th Anniversary for the largest trap shooting competition in the world. We’ll talk with the people who make this tournament run behind the scenes and explore what makes this tournament such a special event. We’ll also look at the rich history of The Grand. On-site we’ll chat with the curator of the Trapshooting Hall of Fame and look at some of the incredible historical pieces on display in the museum. Additionally, we’ll learn about White Flyer and how the clay manufacturer has made important innovations for the shotgun sports.

programme.title: The Journey Within
programme.desc: Join Mark Peterson on an epic hunting adventure in the stunning landscapes of New Zealand as he goes after Whitetail deer. On this hunt, Mark was unable to get his firearms import permit in time to take his Gunwerks rifle, so he'd have to borrow a trusty rifle from his guide, Shawn. Get ready for heart-pounding action, breathtaking scenery, and valuable tips and tricks from a seasoned hunter.

programme.title: Browning Films
programme.sub-title: "The Choice — Last Hour Iowa Whitetail Bruiser"
programme.desc: Ralph’s Iowa buck dreams come true, in a big way, in the last hour of his hunt.

programme.title: Hunting Land Man
programme.desc: A Southwest Mississippi GIANT “Barry” has made more daylight appearances than possibly any mature bucks in existence. Now that Slade is back from the midwest The chase is on.
